What are the treatments for congenital fiber-type disproportion ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of congenital fiber-type disproportion:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Congenital Fiber-Type Disproportion  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital myopathy with fiber type disproportion  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Contracture Deformity  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hypotoni
